title: Kismet
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Slow food restaurant in a updated farmhouse like setting. Has a few lacto-vegetarian choices, a vegan club sandwich with tempeh (cost around $14), and weekend brunch. Uses local and some organic ingredients. Previously located on Barre St.
